word: Then Satan whispered his unbelief, and [those in the synagogue] said, \93Is not this Joseph\92s son?\94. . . How quickly the current changed, and they were filled with madness and rage because Jesus set before them their true spiritual apostasy. They \93rose up, and thrust him out of the city, and led him unto the brow of the hill whereon their city was built, that they might cast him down headlong.\94 But Jesus was protected in His mission by the heavenly angels. Passing through the midst of them unobserved, He went His way. . . .
